Mongrel Mob teen Tana Ormsby-Turner investigation: Court of Appeal grants police access to documents https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/court-of-appeal-grants-police-access-to-documents-in-an-investigation-into-mongrel-mob-teen-tana-ormsby-turner/F4UGIIEYDBDALFGHFLRJVO3XJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/court-of-appeal-grants-police-access-to-documents-in-an-investigation-into-mongrel-mob-teen-tana-ormsby-turner/F4UGIIEYDBDALFGHFLRJVO3XJM/ Tara ShaskeyHe gained his Mongrel Mob patch before sentencing but told the court he had cut ties. Wed, 19 Mar 2025 20:00:00 +0000 Teen Mongrel Mob member Tana Ormsby-Turner was jailed for his involvement in the murder of an Uru Taha prospect. A police investigation into him having allegedly attempted to pervert the course of justice is ongoing.
